```{r}
# Import Data
test = read_csv("./data/solubility_test.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  na.omit()

train = read.csv("./data/solubility_train.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  na.omit()
```

# Question 1: Fit a linear model using least squares
```{r}
set.seed(1)
fit_lm = lm(solubility ~., data = train)
summary(fit_lm)
fit_lm_test = predict(fit_lm, data = test)
mse = mean((test$solubility - fit_lm_test)^2)
mse
```
